stock.model

Interface PersistStrategyJSON

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistStrategyJSONImpl

    public interface PersistStrategyJSON
    The interface that handles the serializing and deserializing of portfolio objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Strategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String strategyName)
      Loads a strategy object on the disk by deserializing the object from the JSON representation.
      void saveStrategy(Strategy strategy)
      Saves the given strategy object as JSON.

    • Method Detail

      • saveStrategy

        void saveStrategy(Strategy strategy)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the given strategy object as JSON.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the object to be serialized.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if input source throws error.

      • loadStrategy

        Strategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String strategyName)
        Loads a strategy object on the disk by deserializing the object from the JSON representation.
        Parameters:
        strategyName - the name of the strategy file or path.
        Returns:
        the object converted from the JSON.
